verb.description: (of a steam engine) move with a regular sharp puffing sound.
examples: the train was chuffing out of the station
the parents should tell their daughter to get off her chuff and earn the money she receives

exclamation.description: Used for emphasis in questions and exclamations.
examples: how the chuff should I know?
Alan asks her where the chuff she's going

origin: 1940s: origin uncertain; the exclamation is a euphemistic alteration of fuck or a similar expletive.
